com.ashwin.fri.pacman.actor

Class Pinky

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ashwin.fri.pacman.actor.Actor
      • com.ashwin.fri.pacman.actor.Ghost
        • com.ashwin.fri.pacman.actor.Pinky

  • public class Pinky
extends Ghost
    Pinky is the pink ghost in classic PacMan. Pinky targets a tile that is four tiles in front of PacMan's current position.
    Author:
    ashwin

    • Method Detail

      • getIdleDuration

        public int getIdleDuration()
        Description copied from class: Ghost
        The number of milliseconds that the idles state lasts. The idle state duration is independent of difficulty. Certain ghosts will always take longer to appear than other ghosts no matter the difficulty.
        Specified by:
        getIdleDuration in class Ghost
        Returns:
        millisecond duration of the idle state

      • getChaseTarget

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D getChaseTarget(java.util.List<Actor> actors,
                                   Grid grid)
        Description copied from class: Ghost
        Returns the target orientation in the chase state. Implementations of ghosts must define this behavior.
        grid - current game
        Returns:
        target orientation in chase state
